entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
